author: Reuters Editorial
title: China health commission says virus transmission risks remain
description: China cannot afford to let its guard down when it comes to combating the coronavirus, with the country still at risk from sporadic infections as well as those from overseas, a health official said on Tuesday.
content:
BEIJING/SHANGHAI (Reuters) - China cannot afford to let its guard down when it comes to combating the coronavirus, with the country still at risk from sporadic infections as well as those from overseas, a health official said on Tuesday.
